name: Junior Labyrinth
description:
Magicians, get ready! 
12 secrets hidden in the maze of the magic castle are waiting to be discovered! But the paths are changing constantly: where there was a free passage a mere moment ago, there is now suddenly a wall! Who can best move the corridors to reach the most secrets?

• The junior edition of the famous classic "Labyrinth" 
• Play alone or with up to 4 players 
• Training logical thinking in a playful way
• Including a tutorial to help beginners
intro: The fun tile-shifting game for young players!
